title: Rotational kinematics - alpha from omega for wheel

content.question: A wheel spins with an initial angular velocity of <math alttext="18 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>18</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>rad</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></math> in the clockwise direction and has a constant angular acceleration. What is the magnitude and direction of the angular acceleration?
